Core facilities and innovative instrumen.question: The application should detail requirements for funding, equipment, personnel, and other resources, right?
Core facilities and innovative instrumen.answer: Yes, the application should detail the required funds, equipment, personnel and other resources.
Core facilities and innovative instrumen.category: Core facilities and innovative instrumentation projects

Core facilities and innovative instrumen.title: Innovative Instrument Development Project
Core facilities and innovative instrumen.question: Applicants need to propose the goals, methods and expected results of the project, so should they also attach an estimated timetable?
Core facilities and innovative instrumen.answer: Yes, applicants need to provide an estimated timetable in the application, explaining the steps and progress of the planned implementation.
Core facilities and innovative instrumen.category: Core facilities and innovative instrumentation projects

Core facilities and innovative instrumen.title: Innovative Instrument Development Project
Core facilities and innovative instrumen.question: In addition to describing the program objectives and expected results, is it necessary to provide criteria and application values ​​for evaluating progress and results?
Core facilities and innovative instrumen.answer: Yes, in addition to explaining the program goals and expected results, the applicant also needs to provide the methods and standards for evaluating the program progress and results, as well as the expected contribution and application value.
Core facilities and innovative instrumen.category: Core facilities and innovative instrumentation projects

Core facilities and innovative instrumen.title: Hospital-wide core facilities
Core facilities and innovative instrumen.question: Are the hospital-wide core facilities open to all researchers of Academia Sinica?
Core facilities and innovative instrumen.answer: Yes, the campus-wide core facilities are open to all researchers at Academia Sinica.
Core facilities and innovative instrumen.category: Core facilities and innovative instrumentation projects

Core facilities and innovative instrumen.title: Hospital-wide core facilities
Core facilities and innovative instrumen.question: Is there a fee to use these hospital-wide core facilities?
Core facilities and innovative instrumen.answer: Yes, there is a fee to use these hospital-wide core facilities, primarily to recover maintenance costs.
Core facilities and innovative instrumen.category: Core facilities and innovative instrumentation projects

Core facilities and innovative instrumen.title: Hospital-wide core facilities
Core facilities and innovative instrumen.question: In addition to providing the latest equipment, what other assistance is there?
Core facilities and innovative instrumen.answer: In addition to providing the latest instruments and equipment, the hospital-wide core facilities also have full-time staff who can assist in designing experiments, conducting sample testing and analyzing experimental data. At the same time, it also provides instrument operator training and professional technical consultation.
Core facilities and innovative instrumen.category: Core facilities and innovative instrumentation projects

Core facilities and innovative instrumen.title: Hospital-wide core facilities
Core facilities and innovative instrumen.question: Are these campus-wide core facilities specialized in different technical areas?
Core facilities and innovative instrumen.answer: Yes, the hospital-wide core facilities specialize in different technical fields, and can provide scientific instruments required for scientific experimental research, cutting-edge technology for product development, as well as instrument operator training and professional technical consultation.
Core facilities and innovative instrumen.category: Core facilities and innovative instrumentation projects

Core facilities and innovative instrumen.title: Hospital-wide core facilities
Core facilities and innovative instrumen.question: How can I find contact information if I want to use the hospital-wide core facilities?
Core facilities and innovative instrumen.answer: If you want to use the hospital-wide core facilities, you can go to the website of each core facility to view the contact information of the facility contractors. In addition, for detailed descriptions of each facility, please refer to this website: https://daais.sinica.edu.tw/pages/519.
Core facilities and innovative instrumen.category: Core facilities and innovative instrumentation projects

Core facilities and innovative instrumen.title: Hospital-wide core facilities
Core facilities and innovative instrumen.question: Which website should I refer to for detailed instructions on facilities?
Core facilities and innovative instrumen.answer: To view the detailed description of the facilities, you can refer to this website: https://daais.sinica.edu.tw/pages/519.
Core facilities and innovative instrumen.category: Core facilities and innovative instrumentation projects

Core facilities and innovative instrumen.title: Hospital-wide core facilities
Core facilities and innovative instrumen.question: Apart from researchers at Academia Sinica, can external units use the campus-wide core facilities?
Core facilities and innovative instrumen.answer: The units outside the hospital can be used when there is enough service in the core facilities of the whole hospital. However, it is recommended to check the contact information of the organizers on the website of each core facility and confirm whether there are resources available.
Core facilities and innovative instrumen.category: Core facilities and innovative instrumentation projects

Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.title: Drug synthesis and analysis core facilities
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.question: What problems does the Drug Synthesis and Analysis Core Facility help solve?
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.answer: The drug synthesis and analysis core facilities are mainly used to help solve the synthesis and analysis problems related to drug research and development, including providing high-precision and high-resolution structure identification and quantitative analysis services, as well as the use of advanced chemical synthesis technology to develop new drugs and customized projects .
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.category: Entered the non-exclusive core facilities of the Biomedical Translation Research Center

Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.title: Drug synthesis and analysis core facilities
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.question: What are the three main units of this facility?
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.answer: This facility is mainly divided into three units, which are nuclear magnetic resonance core facility, mass spectrometry core facility and chemical and drug synthesis unit.
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.category: Entered the non-exclusive core facilities of the Biomedical Translation Research Center

Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.title: Drug synthesis and analysis core facilities
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.question: Is your nuclear magnetic resonance and mass spectrometry core facility unit jointly built with the Biomedical Translation Research Center of Academia Sinica?
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.answer: Yes, our nuclear magnetic resonance and mass spectrometry core facility units are jointly established with the Innovation and Incubation Center of the Biomedical Translation Research Center of the Academia Sinica.
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.category: Entered the non-exclusive core facilities of the Biomedical Translation Research Center

Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.title: Drug synthesis and analysis core facilities
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.question: What advanced chemical synthesis techniques does the Chemical and Pharmaceutical Synthesis unit provide?
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.answer: The high-level chemical synthesis technologies provided by the chemical and drug synthesis unit include asymmetric synthesis, synthesis of new drug metabolism intermediates, coupling of small molecules and biological agents, synthesis of standard samples, quantifiable synthesis pathway planning, novel synthesis pathway planning and synthesis technology consultation, etc. Serve.
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.category: Entered the non-exclusive core facilities of the Biomedical Translation Research Center

Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.title: Drug synthesis and analysis core facilities
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.question: How will this service drive the domestic biotechnology industry to increase R&D energy in the future?
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.answer: In the future, this service will drive the domestic biotechnology industry to increase its research and development capabilities, mainly by providing high-precision and high-resolution structural identification and quantitative analysis services to meet the needs of small and large molecule drug development. In addition, through advanced chemical synthesis techniques, such as asymmetric synthesis, synthesis of new drug metabolism intermediates, etc., we assist in customized new drug development projects. Finally, together with the National Biotechnology Research Park and the High Magnetic Field Laboratory of the Academia Sinica, we will establish a research cluster related to NMR and MRI, from small molecule synthesis to macromolecular structure analysis, covering animal and molecular imaging, and providing one-stop professional services and consultation for biotechnology manufacturers.
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.category: Entered the non-exclusive core facilities of the Biomedical Translation Research Center

Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.title: Drug synthesis and analysis core facilities
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.question: What professional services and consultations can this facility provide for biotechnology manufacturers?
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.answer: This facility can provide many professional services and consultations for biotechnology manufacturers, including nuclear magnetic resonance, mass spectrometry, chemical and drug synthesis, etc. In addition, it also provides one-stop professional services and consultations from small molecule synthesis to macromolecular structure analysis, animal and molecular imaging.
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.category: Entered the non-exclusive core facilities of the Biomedical Translation Research Center

Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.title: Drug synthesis and analysis core facilities
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.question: Where can I learn more about the introduction, usage rules, charging standards and contact information of each unit?
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.answer: You can learn more information at these websites: Nuclear Magnetic Resonance: https://biotrec.sinica.edu.tw/pages/2115 Mass Spectrometry: https://biotrec.sinica.edu.tw/pages/2116 Chemistry and drug synthesis: https://biotrec.sinica.edu.tw/pages/2118
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.category: Entered the non-exclusive core facilities of the Biomedical Translation Research Center

Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.title: Human Therapeutic Antibody Development Platform
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.question: How does this human therapeutic antibody research and development platform help the biotech community to develop new drugs?
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.answer: This research and development platform is mainly to assist the biotechnology industry to develop potential antibodies, accelerate the translation verification and clinical trials of new antibody drugs, thereby creating a niche for the new drug industry. The platform has successfully established a phage-displayed human natural antibody library containing more than 60 billion strains of human antibodies, and confirmed the diversity of antibodies through sequencing analysis. In addition, the platform also provides a number of services, such as human antibody preparation, monoclonal antibody preparation, etc., to meet the needs of customers.
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.category: Entered the non-exclusive core facilities of the Biomedical Translation Research Center

Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.title: Human Therapeutic Antibody Development Platform
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.question: What is the process of preparing human antibodies from phage display antibody library?
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.answer: The process of preparing human antibodies by phage display antibody library is mainly to present a large number of human antibodies on the surface of phage, and then screen the target antigen. After screening, we can find human antibodies with high specificity and affinity, which can be used for disease treatment and drug development.
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.category: Entered the non-exclusive core facilities of the Biomedical Translation Research Center

Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.title: Human Therapeutic Antibody Development Platform
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.question: How is mouse ascites antibody production and purification performed?
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.answer: The process of mouse ascites antibody production and purification mainly includes the following steps: 1. First, inject fusion tumor cells capable of producing antibodies into the abdomen of mice, and let these cells multiply and secrete antibodies in large numbers in mice. 2. After a period of time, the fusion tumor cells will release a large amount of antibodies into the mouse ascites, forming the so-called "antibody concentration ascites". 3. Next, we will collect the ascites of these mice, which contains a large amount of antibodies. 4. Finally, use purification technology such as FPLC chromatography to recover and purify the antibody to obtain high-quality antibodies for subsequent research. This whole process is an important service item in the human therapeutic antibody development platform to prepare antibodies with potential.
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.category: Entered the non-exclusive core facilities of the Biomedical Translation Research Center

Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.title: Human Therapeutic Antibody Development Platform
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.question: What are the advantages of using the GH Antibody Library to develop antibodies against specific antigens?
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.answer: Using the GH antibody library to develop antibodies against specific antigens has the advantages of high specificity, neutrality, low immune rejection and low side effects. These characteristics make this antibody very effective in the clinical treatment of cancer, autoimmune diseases, and infectious diseases, and is a major trend in the development of new drugs worldwide. All in all, antibodies developed using the GH antibody library have broad application prospects and therapeutic potential.
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.category: Entered the non-exclusive core facilities of the Biomedical Translation Research Center

Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.title: Human Therapeutic Antibody Development Platform
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.question: What are the customized services provided by this platform?
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.answer: The customized service provided by this platform will provide corresponding antibody research services according to the needs of customers, and the specific content will be carried out according to customer requirements.
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.category: Entered the non-exclusive core facilities of the Biomedical Translation Research Center

Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.title: Human Therapeutic Antibody Development Platform
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.question: If I want to use the facilities and equipment of this platform, how can I check the usage rules and charging standards?
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.answer: To view usage rules and charging standards, please visit this website: https://biotrec.sinica.edu.tw/pages/2091.
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.category: Entered the non-exclusive core facilities of the Biomedical Translation Research Center

Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.title: Taiwan Mouse Clinic
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.question: What services does Taiwan Mouse Clinic provide?
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.answer: The Taiwan Mouse Clinic mainly provides advanced and diversified phenotypic analysis services and standardized and customized package services for the safety and efficacy evaluation of various types of drugs, assisting the research and industry circles in the development of new drugs. The facilities can be divided into animal facilities and phenotype and efficacy analysis. Animal facilities provide basic experimental operation space, equipment and mouse purification services; phenotype and efficacy analysis provide domestic and foreign biomedical researchers with high-tech performance of small animals Type identification technology, drug efficacy analysis and drug safety testing and other experiments and research.
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.category: Entered the non-exclusive core facilities of the Biomedical Translation Research Center

Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.title: Taiwan Mouse Clinic
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.question: Can you tell me what are the two major parts of this facility?
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.answer: This facility is mainly divided into two parts: animal facilities and phenotype and efficacy analysis. The animal facility provides space for raising mice and various experimental operations, and the phenotype and pharmacodynamic analysis provides high-tech phenotype identification technology for small animals in biomedical drug research.
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.category: Entered the non-exclusive core facilities of the Biomedical Translation Research Center

Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.title: Taiwan Mouse Clinic
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.question: What services does the mouse raising project specifically include?
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.answer: The mouse surrogacy project provides a series of services, including basic experimental operation space and equipment, humanized intestinal microbial mice for new drug development, and mouse purification. In addition, mice are responsible for phenotyping, new drug drug development and animal imaging test analysis.
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.category: Entered the non-exclusive core facilities of the Biomedical Translation Research Center

Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.title: Taiwan Mouse Clinic
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.question: What high-tech phenotyping techniques does Phenotyping and Pharmacodynamics provide?
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.answer: Phenotyping and pharmacodynamic analysis provides six types of high-tech phenotypic identification technologies, including experiments in neuroscience, cardiovascular disease, pathology research, physiological metabolism, biological imaging, and immune response.
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.category: Entered the non-exclusive core facilities of the Biomedical Translation Research Center

Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.title: Taiwan Mouse Clinic
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.question: How does this clinic assist in drug safety testing and drug efficacy analysis?
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.answer: The clinic is mainly divided into animal facilities and phenotype-pharmaceutical analysis to assist in drug safety testing and efficacy analysis. Animal facilities provide surrogate mice, basic experimental equipment, and mouse purification services for new drug development and animal imaging test analysis. The phenotype and pharmacodynamic analysis provides six types of high-tech phenotype identification technologies for small animals, including neuroscience, cardiovascular disease, pathology research, physiological metabolism, biological imaging, and immune response experiments. Through these experiments, it assists in drug efficacy analysis and drug safety testing, and promotes various researches that use small animals as a study of human disease models and drug development.
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.category: Entered the non-exclusive core facilities of the Biomedical Translation Research Center

Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.title: Taiwan Mouse Clinic
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.question: If you want to contact the Taiwan Mouse Clinic, what contact information can you provide?
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.answer: To contact the Taiwan Mouse Clinic, you can refer to their website https://biotrec.sinica.edu.tw/posts/135922, which will have detailed information on facility introduction, usage rules, charging standards and contact information.
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.category: Entered the non-exclusive core facilities of the Biomedical Translation Research Center

Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.title: Taiwan Mouse Clinic
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.question: What kind of new drug development does this clinic mainly assist in?
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.answer: This clinic is mainly to assist the research and industry in the development of new drugs, provide advanced and diversified phenotypic analysis services, and establish standardized and customized package services for the safety and efficacy evaluation of sample drugs. They also provide high-tech phenotyping techniques and drug safety testing in small animals to facilitate research in small animals for human disease modeling and drug development.
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.category: Entered the non-exclusive core facilities of the Biomedical Translation Research Center

Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.title: animal imaging facility
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.question: How does the customized MRI and micro-CT imaging service provided by this animal imaging facility work?
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.answer: This animal imaging facility is supported by state-of-the-art MRI and CT scans. They will conduct customized MRI and micro-CT imaging scans according to your needs and experimental design to meet your needs in biotechnology research and development, drug development and translational research. The content of the service covers the collection and analysis of imaging data, as well as biomedical application research and other fields, aiming to assist the development and competitiveness of Taiwan's biomedical industry. For more details and contact information, you can refer to their official website.
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.category: Entered the non-exclusive core facilities of the Biomedical Translation Research Center

Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.title: animal imaging facility
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.question: If I want a custom animal model, what evaluation packages can you help with?
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.answer: We can provide you with customized animal models and various customized evaluation packages. For specific service items, please refer to our website https://biotrec.sinica.edu.tw/pages/2136 for further details and items. If you have other questions, please feel free to contact us.
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.category: Entered the non-exclusive core facilities of the Biomedical Translation Research Center

Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.title: animal imaging facility
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.question: What are professional image interpretation and special image post-processing services?
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.answer: Professional image interpretation and special image post-processing services refer to providing professional analysis of MRI and computerized tomography images according to different needs, as well as further processing or adjustment of images to help users obtain clearer and more accurate results in research or application. result.
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.category: Entered the non-exclusive core facilities of the Biomedical Translation Research Center

Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.title: animal imaging facility
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.question: How is the non-living scan service different from other scans?
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.answer: Non-vivid scan services are scans of dead animals, while other scans are of live animals. This scanning method allows us to study the structure and function of the animal body without affecting the living animal.
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.category: Entered the non-exclusive core facilities of the Biomedical Translation Research Center

Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.title: animal imaging facility
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.question: What kind of comprehensive animal experiment consultation, planning and experimental design do you provide?
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.answer: We provide a full range of animal experiment consultation, planning and experimental design, including customized MRI/micro-CT imaging services, customized animal models and various customized evaluation package services, professional image interpretation and special image post-processing services , and non-liveness scanning services. Through these services, we can assist the industry and academia to accelerate biotechnology research and development, drug development and translational research, and promote the development and international competitiveness of Taiwan's biomedical industry.
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.category: Entered the non-exclusive core facilities of the Biomedical Translation Research Center

Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.title: animal imaging facility
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.question: What are the characteristics of the ultra-high-resolution small animal live tomography scanner in this facility?
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.answer: This ultra-high-resolution small animal living tomography scanner is characterized by its ability to provide very high image quality and details, which is especially helpful for the research and observation of small animals. Provide important support for biotechnology research and development, drug development and other fields in the industry and academia. For more information, please refer to this URL: https://biotrec.sinica.edu.tw/pages/2136.
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.category: Entered the non-exclusive core facilities of the Biomedical Translation Research Center

Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.title: animal imaging facility
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.question: Where can I check the introduction, usage rules, charging standards and contact information about this facility?
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.answer: You can go to this website to view the introduction, usage rules, charging standards and contact information of this facility: https://biotrec.sinica.edu.tw/pages/2136
Entered the non-exclusive core facilitie.category: Entered the non-exclusive core facilities of the Biomedical Translation Research Center

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Core Facility for Transgenic Mice
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Is this transgenic mouse core facility a place to help researchers produce genetically modified mice?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: Yes, the core facility for genetically modified mice is a place dedicated to helping researchers produce genetically modified mice, and also provides other related technical services.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Core Facility for Transgenic Mice
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Which two gene editing techniques have been successfully established at the Transgenic Mice Core Facility?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The Core Facility for Transgenic Mice has successfully established two gene editing technologies, Transcription Activator-Like Nucleic Acid (TALEN) and Cluster-Associated Protein of Constant Palindromic Repeats (CRISPR).

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Core Facility for Transgenic Mice
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: The well-known TALEN and CRISPR technology names are abbreviations, right?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: Yes, both TALEN and CRISPR are acronyms. TALEN is the abbreviation of Transcription Activator-like Effectors Nuclease, and CRISPR is the abbreviation of Clustered Regularly Interspaced Short Palindromic Repeats, both of which are gene editing technologies used to produce genetically modified mice.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Core Facility for Transgenic Mice
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Do they introduce new research techniques every year to improve experimental efficiency?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: Yes, they introduce new research techniques every year to improve the efficiency of gene editing experiments and hopefully shorten the time to produce genetically modified mice.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Core Facility for Transgenic Mice
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: From TALEN/CRISPR technology to in vitro fertilization, what are the main programs offered by this facility?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The main projects provided by this facility include production of transgenic or knockout mice, production of genetically modified mice using TALEN/CRISPR technology, genetic targeting of mouse embryonic stem cells, conditional gene knockout, chimeric mouse production, embryonic Freezing, sperm freezing, in vitro fertilization and embryo transfer, etc. In addition, they also provide services such as experimental design consultation on tool mice and transgenic mice.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Core Facility for Transgenic Mice
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: What are the main equipment of the core facility for transgenic mice?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The main equipment of this core facility for transgenic mice includes a transgenic machine, a microinjection system, a needle puller and a needle caster.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Core Facility for Transgenic Mice
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Who manages this core facility and what is his role?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: This core facility is managed by Cai Qingyan, whose position is research associate technician.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Core Facility for Transgenic Mice
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: I would like to know more about the core facilities of genetically modified mice. Where can I find the usage rules, charging standards and contact information?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: If you want to know more about the core facilities of transgenic mice, including usage rules, charging standards and contact information, you can visit this website: https://www.imb.sinica.edu.tw/TCF/.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Public Animal Facilities
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: What kind of service does this public animal facility mainly provide?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: This public animal facility is mainly to provide Academia Sinica research colleagues with a surrogacy space for experimental animals that is free from specific pathogens, and to provide services for borrowing instruments and equipment for anesthesia, operation, sampling and monitoring of mouse physiological signals.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Public Animal Facilities
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: What review process is required before applying to use a shared animal facility?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: Before applying for the use of public animal facilities, the research plan must first be reviewed and approved by the Laboratory Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC) of the Academia Sinica, and then the animal health monitoring report must be prepared for the review of the facility organizer, and the laboratory animal entry procedure can only be carried out after approval.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Public Animal Facilities
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: What does specific disease-free SPF mouse surrogacy service mean?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: Specific pathogen-free SPF mouse surrogacy service refers to providing an environment free of specific pathogens, allowing these mice to live and reproduce in such an environment to ensure that they will not be affected by diseases. This can effectively maintain the stability and reliability of the experiment.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Public Animal Facilities
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: What types of animal experiments does the facility primarily support?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The facility mainly supports animal experiments related to tumor testing, drug testing, immunity, neurology and development.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Public Animal Facilities
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: What are the main equipment of public animal facilities?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The main equipment of public animal facilities includes independent ventilation feeding system, biological safety cabinet, air anesthesia machine and live cold light system.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Public Animal Facilities
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: On which floor are the facilities located? Who will manage it?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The facility is located on the 10th floor and is managed by Associate Researcher Xu Zhiwen.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Public Animal Facilities
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: How to inquire about the usage rules, charging standards and contact information of public animal facilities?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: You can go to this website to check the usage rules, charging standards and contact information of public animal facilities: https://ascore.sinica.edu.tw/

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Biophysics Core Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Who is the Biophysics Core facility open to?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The biophysics core facilities are mainly open to researchers from Academia Sinica, as well as people from domestic universities and other academic research institutions.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Biophysics Core Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: What molecular qualitative analyzes can I perform at this facility?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: In the Biophysics Core Facility, you can use a variety of molecular qualitative analysis instruments to understand the physicochemical properties of biomolecules, such as particle size, molecular weight, as well as thermodynamic, kinetic and structural information on interactions between biomolecules. The main equipment includes analytical ultra-high-speed centrifuge, surface plasmon resonance biomolecular sensor, circular dichroism instrument, isothermal titration enthalpy meter, thermal differential scanning calorimeter, protein stability analyzer, high-throughput Biofilm interferometer, dynamic light scattering instrument, viscometer and density meter, etc. Finally, it should be noted that the charging standards and usage rules of each facility can be further viewed through this website: http://bcf.daais.sinica.edu.tw/index_C.html.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Biophysics Core Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Does the facility offer educational training and instrument operator certification courses?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: Yes, the facility will not only conduct educational training on various instruments from time to time, but also provide paid instrument operation certification courses. Qualified users can make an appointment to operate the instrument by themselves.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Biophysics Core Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: If I want to make an appointment to use one of these instruments, do I need to pay?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: Yes, if you want to make an appointment to use the instrument, there is a fee. For specific fees, please refer to their official website: http://bcf.daais.sinica.edu.tw/index_C.html

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Biophysics Core Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Where is the facility located?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: This facility is located in Room 402 on the 4th floor of the Institute of Biochemistry, Academia Sinica.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Biophysics Core Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Where can I find information about terms of use and contact information?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: You can find information such as usage rules, fees and contact information on the official website of the Biophysics Core Facility. The URL is: http://bcf.daais.sinica.edu.tw/index_C.html.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Biosafety Level 3 Laboratory
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: In what year was this third-level biosafety laboratory opened?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The third level of biosafety laboratory was opened in June 2009.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Biosafety Level 3 Laboratory
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Is the main research object the personnel of Academia Sinica or other institutions?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The main research object is the researchers of Academia Sinica, but it will also conduct research cooperation with domestic public and private universities, research institutions and biotechnology industry.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Biosafety Level 3 Laboratory
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: What types of experiments can this P3 laboratory do?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: This P3 laboratory can mainly conduct operational experiments on viruses of Risk Group 3, such as dangerous biosafety, but does not include bacterial infection and animal experiments. At the same time, this laboratory can improve Taiwan's capabilities in the research, prevention and control of dangerous viruses, and biosafety protection.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Biosafety Level 3 Laboratory
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: What training and certification do operators need to receive before using the P3 laboratory?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: Before using the P3 laboratory, operators need to receive training in accordance with the laboratory's standard operating procedures, and only after passing the certification can they independently operate dangerous pathogens for experiments.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Biosafety Level 3 Laboratory
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: What are the main equipment of this P3 laboratory?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The main equipment includes a full negative pressure environment and Class II-A2, B2 biosafety operation cabinets.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Biosafety Level 3 Laboratory
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Where can we inquire about the usage rules, charging standards and contact information of this laboratory?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: You can check the relevant information of this laboratory on the website of the Institute of Biomedical Sciences of Academia Sinica at https://www.ibms.sinica.edu.tw/support_dep/full_version/index28.html.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Experimental Plant Core Greenhouse Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Which units are the experimental plant core greenhouse facilities mainly provided for?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: This experimental plant core greenhouse facility is mainly provided to researchers of Academia Sinica, domestic universities and other academic research institutions.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Experimental Plant Core Greenhouse Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: How to make an appointment to use this greenhouse facility?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: To make an appointment to use this greenhouse facility, you can refer to the official website of Academia Sinica’s experimental plant core greenhouse facility http://abrc.sinica.edu.tw/greenhouse/, where you can find usage rules, charging standards and contact information.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Experimental Plant Core Greenhouse Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: What professional services does the facility offer to help researchers?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: This facility provides plant growth space, plant gene transfer service, plant planting valet operation, medium management material service, and special personnel to assist in maintaining constant temperature and humidity of plant growth equipment, management of diseases and insect pests, soil fertilization and cultivation, etc., which is convenient for researchers to carry out plant growth and development Related research.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Experimental Plant Core Greenhouse Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: How many units are available to researchers in the facility?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: There are 140 units available to researchers within the facility.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Experimental Plant Core Greenhouse Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: In addition to basic plant growth equipment, what auxiliary facilities are there to facilitate experimental operations?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: In addition to basic plant growth equipment, there are auxiliary facilities for convenient experimental operations such as plant photography room, medium room, soil preparation room and public laboratory.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Experimental Plant Core Greenhouse Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: What are the main equipment?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The main equipment includes walk-in growth room, high-light growth room, single-door and double-door plant growth box, net room and glass room greenhouse, experimental plant photography room and autoclave.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Experimental Plant Core Greenhouse Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: In which area of ​​Academia Sinica is the facility located?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The facility is located at the new Greenhouse Building and Molecular Breeding Greenhouse at the bottom of Shengke Avenue, Academia Sinica.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Experimental Plant Core Greenhouse Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: How to inquire about the usage rules, charging standards and contact information of the experimental plant core greenhouse facilities?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: To inquire about the usage rules, charging standards and contact information of the experimental plant core greenhouse facilities, you can refer to this website: http://abrc.sinica.edu.tw/greenhouse/.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Experimental Plant Core Greenhouse Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Can I seek professional assistance in maintaining constant temperature and humidity of plant growth equipment, managing pests and diseases, and soil fertilization and cultivation?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: Of course, the experimental plant core greenhouse facilities will provide special personnel to assist in maintaining constant temperature and humidity of plant growth equipment, management of diseases and insect pests, and soil fertilization and cultivation.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Nucleic Acid Sequencing Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: In what year did this nucleic acid sequencing facility start providing services?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: This nucleic acid sequencing facility started providing services in 2005.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Nucleic Acid Sequencing Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Which organizations do you mainly serve?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: It mainly provides services for researchers of Academia Sinica, domestic universities and other academic research institutions.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Nucleic Acid Sequencing Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: What are the characteristics of Sanger sequencing method, why choose it for nucleic acid sequencing analysis?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The Sanger sequencing method is characterized by fast and accurate, it is the preferred tool to confirm the sequence of short fragments (less than 1Kbp). Using it for nucleic acid sequencing analysis can ensure the correctness of the results, so we choose it for nucleic acid sequencing analysis.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Nucleic Acid Sequencing Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Is there a dedicated staff to handle and analyze the samples?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: Yes, Facility Services has dedicated personnel to operate the instruments and analyze the samples.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Nucleic Acid Sequencing Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: What are the main service projects?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The main service projects include plastid double-stranded DNA sequencing, cosmid vector DNA sequencing, PCR product DNA sequencing, and nucleic acid sequencing experiment design consultation.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Nucleic Acid Sequencing Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: What is the main equipment used in this facility?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: There are two main equipment used in this facility, one is ABI 3730xl DNA nucleic acid analysis system, and the other is gradient nucleic acid amplification instrument.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Nucleic Acid Sequencing Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Where is the nucleic acid sequencing facility located at Academia Sinica?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The nucleic acid sequencing facility is located in room N719 on the 7th floor of the Institute of Biomedicine, Academia Sinica.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Nucleic Acid Sequencing Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Who is in charge of managing this facility?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The person in charge of managing this facility is Research Assistant Technician Li Fuan.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Nucleic Acid Sequencing Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: How to inquire about the usage rules, charging standards and contact information of nucleic acid sequencing facilities?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: To inquire about the use rules, charging standards and contact information of nucleic acid sequencing facilities, you can go to this website to view: https://www.ibms.sinica.edu.tw/support_dep/index21.html

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Life science electric display core facilities
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: For which service projects are the core facilities of life science teledisplay mainly established?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The core facilities of life science electric imaging are mainly set up for the following service projects: 1. Provide sample preparation services, such as negative staining, metal projection, tissue embedding, etc.; 2. Electron microscope imaging services; 3. For independent use of facilities Provide one-to-one instrument teaching for users; 4. Electron microscope experiment design consulting services.

Hospital-wide core facilities.question: What are the main equipment provided by this facility?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The main equipment provided by this facility are: 1. FEI Tecnai G2 F20 S-Twin field emission transmission electron microscope; 2. FEI Quanta 200 scanning electron microscope; 3. Microwave processor for biological samples; 4. Leica high pressure freezing and automatic Freeze replacement system; 5. Ultra-high vacuum carbon coating device and glow discharge system; 6. Ultrathin microtome.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Life science electric display core facilities
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: If I need to use the facilities and equipment independently, can I provide one-on-one instrument teaching service?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: Yes, they offer one-on-one instrument instruction if you need independent use of the facility.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Life science electric display core facilities
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Who are the life science TV display core facilities mainly serving?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The core facilities of life science electric display mainly provide services for researchers of Academia Sinica, research and development personnel of domestic universities and private enterprises.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: New Generation Genome Sequencing Core Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: What is the purpose of the Next Generation Genome Sequencing Core Facility?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The New Generation Genome Sequencing Core Facility was originally established to support the strain sequencing of the National Biomass Energy Research Program. Later, under the impetus of the Academia Sinica Nucleic Acid Sequencing User Committee, it began to provide services to colleagues in the whole academy, and also provided services to other academic research institutions one after another.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: New Generation Genome Sequencing Core Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Who is its main target audience?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The main service objects are researchers of Academia Sinica, domestic universities and other academic research institutions.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: New Generation Genome Sequencing Core Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: What are the main service items offered by this facility?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: This facility mainly provides five service projects, including DNA/RNA sample quality testing, gene library construction and library quality testing, use of internal reference genes to calibrate transcription effects, genome sequencing and NGS genome sequencing experiment design consulting services.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: New Generation Genome Sequencing Core Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: What are the major pieces of equipment in this facility?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The main equipment in this facility includes Illumina HiSeq 2500 high-throughput genome analysis system, Illumina MiSeq genome multifunctional analysis system, Illumina NextSeq 2000 high-throughput genome sequencing system, PacBio Sequel system third-generation sequencer, Oxford Nanopore GridION MK1 third-generation single-molecule high-throughput genome sequencing system, 10x Genomics Chromium single-cell analysis system, Agilent BioAnalyzer biochemical analyzer, Agilent Fragment Analyzer biochemical analyzer, Agilent FEMTO Pulse Automated Pulsed-Field Capillary Electrophoresis Analyzer, M220 focused ultrasound instrument, and Sage Science BluePippin and ELF automatic DNA fragment recovery system.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: New Generation Genome Sequencing Core Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Who is the Facilities Supervisor and what is his/her role?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The director of the facility is Lu Meiye, and his position is a research technician.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: New Generation Genome Sequencing Core Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Where is the Next Generation Genome Sequencing Core Facility located?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The new-generation genome sequencing core facility is located in Room A603 on the 6th floor of the Interdisciplinary Science and Technology Research Building of the Academia Sinica.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: New Generation Genome Sequencing Core Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Where should we go to find out about usage rules, charging standards and contact information?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: To learn about usage rules, charging standards and contact information, you can go to this website: http://ngs.biodiv.tw/NGSCore/.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Neuroscience Core Laboratory
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: What two types of services does the Neuroscience Core Laboratory mainly provide?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The neuroscience core laboratory mainly provides electrophysiological and imaging services.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Neuroscience Core Laboratory
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Is the laboratory open to applications from academic units outside the hospital?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: Yes, the neuroelectrophysiology laboratory is open to applications from academic units outside the hospital, and scholars inside and outside the hospital are welcome to make more use of it.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Neuroscience Core Laboratory
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: What are their main service projects?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: Their main service projects include extracellular group excitatory post-synaptic potential recording of tissue slices, planar microelectrode array recording, whole-cell clamp membrane recording, calcium ion image recording, confocal microscopy image capture, light stimulation and other image analysis experiments , and optical recording of membrane potential with voltage-sensitive dyes.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Neuroscience Core Laboratory
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: What major equipment can be found in the Neuroscience Core Laboratory?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: In the neuroscience core laboratory, you can find the following main equipment: electrophysiological signal recording platform with light stimulation light source system, ED64 microelectrode array recording system, Zeiss inverted microscope whole-cell clamp membrane recording platform, Zeiss observer.D1 calcium ion imaging Platform, Zeiss LSM880 confocal microscope (including Airyscan and in vivo experiment function), MiCAM05 imaging platform, oscillating microtome D.S.K. microslicer DTK-1000, horizontal needle puller SUTTER MODEL P-97 Pipette puller, glass electrode needle puller NARISHIGE PC -10. Micro-Osmometer Model 3300, an osmotic pressure detector, and IMARIS imaging software.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Neuroscience Core Laboratory
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Where are the laboratory facilities located?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The laboratory facilities are located in Room I-07 on the second basement floor of the Interdisciplinary Science and Technology Research Building of Academia Sinica.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Neuroscience Core Laboratory
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Which two institutes are the people responsible for managing the labs from?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The staff who manage the laboratories are from the Institute of Biomedical Sciences and the Institute of Molecular Biology respectively.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Neuroscience Core Laboratory
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: How to inquire about the rules of use, charging standards and contact information of the Neuroscience Core Laboratory?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: To inquire about the usage rules, charging standards and contact information of the Neuroscience Core Laboratory, you can directly visit their website at http://npas.programs.sinica.edu.tw/npas_core_facility.html. On this site you will find all the information you need.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Transgenic Plant Core Laboratory
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: When did the core laboratory of transgenic plants start to provide services?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The core laboratory for transgenic plants has provided services since July 1998.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Transgenic Plant Core Laboratory
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: What kind of service projects do you mainly provide?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The main service items provided include Agrobacterium transformation services for 8 kinds of plants, plant gene transformation experiment materials, use of gene guns, as well as plant gene transformation experiment design consulting services and education and training courses.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Transgenic Plant Core Laboratory
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: What are the facilities of this laboratory?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The main equipment in the laboratory includes walk-in growth chamber, desktop gene gun BIO-RAD PDS-1000 and hand-held gene gun, exponential wave and square wave electroporation instrument, fluorescent microscope, dissecting microscope, vibrating microtome, Aseptic operating table, sterilizing pot and related equipment for plant tissue culture.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Transgenic Plant Core Laboratory
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Where is the address of the Transplant Plant Core Laboratory?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The core laboratory of transgenic plants is located on the second floor of the new greenhouse building at the bottom of Shengke Avenue, Academia Sinica.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Transgenic Plant Core Laboratory
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Who is in charge of running the laboratory?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The laboratory is managed by Kuang Linyun, a research assistant at the Agricultural Biotechnology Research Center.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Transgenic Plant Core Laboratory
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: How to inquire about the usage rules, charging standards and contact information of the Transplanted Plant Core Laboratory?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: To inquire about the usage rules, charging standards and contact information of the Transplant Plant Core Laboratory, you can go to this website: http://abrc.sinica.edu.tw/transplant/.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Flow Cytometry Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: What are the main functions of a flow cytometry facility?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The main function of the flow cytometry facility is to use flow cytometry technology to label specific cell substances with fluorescence, and then identify and purify cell populations with specific fluorescence expression according to the fluorescence intensity. The purity of the sorted cell population can reach 98%, and then it can be further cultivated or subjected to functional analysis.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Flow Cytometry Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: What does the sterile sorting of non-infectious animal cells mean?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: Aseptic sorting of non-infectious animal cells is a method of isolating specific cell populations using flow cytometry and ensuring the sterility of the sorting process. By fluorescently marking specific cell substances and identifying the fluorescence intensity to purify cell populations with specific fluorescent expression. Purified cell populations can be as high as 98% pure and can then be used in culture or for functional analysis.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Flow Cytometry Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: What professional training courses does this facility offer?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: This facility provides part of the flow cytometer operation training courses for users, and after passing the examination, they can make an appointment to operate the instrument themselves. In addition, education and training of various instruments are held on a regular basis.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Flow Cytometry Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: What functional assays can be performed on purified cell samples?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: Purified cell samples can be used for functional analysis such as nucleic acid analysis, protein quantitative analysis, image analysis, and injection into the living body for functional observation.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Flow Cytometry Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: How high is the cell purity achieved by flow cytometry?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: Flow cytometry technology can achieve up to 98% cell purity.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Flow Cytometry Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Which agencies does this facility primarily serve?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: This facility mainly serves researchers at Academia Sinica, domestic universities and other academic research institutions.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Flow Cytometry Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: How many flow cytometers are there in the facility?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: There are 3 flow cytometers in the facility.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Flow Cytometry Facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: How do I make an appointment to use the facility or get more information about it?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: You can refer to the official website of the Institute of Biomedical Sciences of Academia Sinica, the website is https://www.ibms.sinica.edu.tw/support_dep/index22.html, which has the rules and charging standards for the use of flow cytometry facilities and contact information. There you can get more information and make an appointment.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Comprehensive Flow Cytometry Laboratory
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Who are the main service targets of the comprehensive flow cytometry laboratory?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The comprehensive flow cytometry laboratory mainly provides services for researchers of Academia Sinica, domestic universities and other academic research institutions.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Comprehensive Flow Cytometry Laboratory
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: What cell analysis and sorting services does this laboratory offer?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: This laboratory provides analysis and sorting services for viruses, bacteria, algae, plant and animal cells.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Comprehensive Flow Cytometry Laboratory
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: How far can a cell population be purified by flow cytometry?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The degree of purification of cell populations by flow cytometry can be as high as 98%.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Comprehensive Flow Cytometry Laboratory
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Can I take an operator training course and operate the flow cytometer myself?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: Yes, you can take an operator training course. After completing the course and passing the course, you can make an appointment to operate the flow cytometer yourself.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Comprehensive Flow Cytometry Laboratory
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: In addition to operation training, are there other instrument education and training activities?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: Yes, in addition to operation training, the comprehensive flow cytometer laboratory also organizes education and training activities for various instruments on a regular basis.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Comprehensive Flow Cytometry Laboratory
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Where are the facilities for the Comprehensive Flow Cytometry Laboratory located?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The facilities of the comprehensive flow cytometry laboratory are located in the R114 laboratory on the first floor of the Institute of Plant and Microbiology, Academia Sinica.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Comprehensive Flow Cytometry Laboratory
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: How to check the usage rules, charging standards and contact information of the laboratory?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: To view the laboratory's usage rules, charging standards and contact information, you can go to this website: https://ipmbfcass.jimdo.com/.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Frozen electric display facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: When did the refrigerated electric display facility start to provide hospital-wide services?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The refrigerated electric display facility has provided hospital-wide services since April 2009.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Frozen electric display facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Which researcher assisted in the planning of the refrigerated electric display facility space on the second basement floor of the Interdisciplinary Science and Technology Research Building?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: Researcher Liao Yanquan assisted in the planning of the refrigerated electric display facility space on the second basement floor of the Interdisciplinary Science and Technology Research Building.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Frozen electric display facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: What is the main research object of single particle cryo-EM (SPA)?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The main research objects of single-particle cryo-electron microscopy (SPA) are biological macromolecules, such as proteins, viruses and their complexes. It can be used to study the structural and conformational changes of these biomacromolecules in solution.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Frozen electric display facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: What are the main service items provided by refrigerated electric display facilities?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The main services provided by the cryo-electric imaging facility include protein macromolecule single-particle structure analysis, cryo-electron tomography research consultation, and service procedures ranging from biomolecular single-particle sample preparation, sample vitrification and freezing, sample screening and collection of single-particle images and use Three-dimensional reconstruction calculation software and instruments are used step by step according to the research process. Intermediate to high-end TEM instruments are used, as well as SPA research services and technical consultation.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Frozen electric display facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: What are the major pieces of equipment in the facility?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The main equipment in this facility are: 1. 120 keV high-contrast transmission electron microscope (JEOL JEM-1400); 2. 200 keV field emission gun transmission electron microscope (FEI Tecnai G2 F20 TWIN); 3. 200 keV keV high-order cryo-electron microscope (FEI Talos Arctica); 4. 300 keV high-order fully automatic cryo-electron microscope (FEI Titan Krios); and 5. Vitrobot cryo-EM sample preparation device.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Frozen electric display facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Where are the laboratories at the Cryo-EM facility located?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The laboratory of the cryoelectric display facility is located in the I-14 laboratory on the second floor of the Interdisciplinary Science and Technology Research Building of the Academia Sinica.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Frozen electric display facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Who is the manager of the facility?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The manager of the facility is Zhang Yuanzhi, a research assistant at the Institute of Biochemistry.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Frozen electric display facility
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: How to know the usage rules, charging standards and contact information of refrigerated electric display facilities?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: To learn about the usage rules, charging standards and contact information of cryoelectric display facilities, you can refer to this website: http://cryoem.ibc.sinica.edu.tw/index-C.php.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Public Mass Spectrometry Facility for Proteosome and Protein Modification Analysis
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: In what year did this public mass spectrometer facility for protein body and protein modification analysis start to provide services?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: This facility has been in service since May 2008.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Public Mass Spectrometry Facility for Proteosome and Protein Modification Analysis
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Who are the main service targets?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The main service objects are researchers of Academia Sinica, as well as personnel of domestic universities and other academic research institutions.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Public Mass Spectrometry Facility for Proteosome and Protein Modification Analysis
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: What types of mass spectrometers does the facility provide for analysis?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The facility offers the following types of mass spectrometers: Thermo LTQ-Orbitrap Velos mass spectrometer, Thermo LTQ-Orbitrap Elite mass spectrometer, Thermo Orbitrap Fusion Tribrid mass spectrometer, Thermo Orbitrap Fusion Lumos Tribrid mass spectrometer, and Waters Synapt G2 High Definition mass spectrometer.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Public Mass Spectrometry Facility for Proteosome and Protein Modification Analysis
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: What are the main service projects?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The main service projects include protein identification services, protein post-translational modification analysis services, high-flow protein quantification services, and protein identification and analysis software, such as Mascot, MaxQuant, and Proteome Discoverer, for users to analyze the mass spectrometry data sent for testing, and to The cooperation method provides customized services from sample preparation and delivery to mass spectrometry data analysis, as well as regular training courses on pre-processing methods and basic mass spectrometry data analysis software implementation.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Public Mass Spectrometry Facility for Proteosome and Protein Modification Analysis
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Where is the equipment mainly distributed?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The equipment is mainly distributed in Laboratory 401 on the 4th floor of the Institute of Biochemistry, Academia Sinica.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Public Mass Spectrometry Facility for Proteosome and Protein Modification Analysis
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Who is the manager in charge of the facility?
Hospital-wide core facilities.answer: The manager in charge of the facility is Research Assistant Technician Lin Shuyu.

Hospital-wide core facilities.title: Public Mass Spectrometry Facility for Proteosome and Protein Modification Analysis
Hospital-wide core facilities.question: Which website should we go to for details on terms of use, fees, and contact details?
